item.title: By: Timberland
item.dc:creator: Timberland
item.description: I'm also planning to buy MacBook, But don't have that much money yet to buy it. Btw are there any other cheaper recommendations ?

item.title: By: Andiz

item.description:
It's never too late to jump on the apple bandwagon ;)
I'm planning on buying a Macbook next month.

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
I'm wanting do do the same thing, but have you checked the price on PowerBooks on eBay lately? My 15 inch is worth a paltry $400ish. :(
I'll try to make it work for me another year... :)
